Bentonite Clay, derived from volcanic ash, is usually grey or cream in color. It is rich in nutrients like Calcium, Magnesium, Silica, Sodium, Copper, Iron, and Potassium. It is a natural clay with a fine, soft texture which when mixed with water, forms a paste. Majorly, it is consisting of montmorillonite. Bentonite has significant colloidal properties and decreases its thickness many times as it falls into contact with liquids. Its unique properties of swelling, water absorption, viscosity, and thixotropy make it very useful for a wide variety of products across several industries. Today, however, our focus is going to be on the benefits of bentonite in the cosmetic industry.

1- Treating oily skin and acne: Bentonite clay’s adsorbent power is helpful in treating acne breakouts and oily skin. The clay helps in removing the excess oil or sebum from the skin’s surface, which results in a calming effect on the inflamed breakouts. Additionally, using this clay’s mask on the face also helps in removing impurities from the skin while simultaneously reducing the risk of pimples and skin infections. It also helps in lightly exfoliating the skin as well as detoxifying it.

2- Treating poison ivy: Urushiol, the oil produced by poison ivy, can lead to allergic reactions like a rash. This rash can cause redness, severe itching, and irritation in all the people who are allergic to it. Bentonite clay can not only heal this rash but also speed up the healing process. It is also said to be effective in treating diaper rash.

A very gentle, mild abrasive with a mild taste, Bentonite clay helps in improving the health of the teeth and gums by removing plaque, remineralizing teeth and thoroughly cleaning the mouth.

It hence aids in strengthening the root of the hair while also improving its quality and texture. Similarly, due to the same properties, it is also used in detoxifying and cleansing bath soaks.

excerpt.rendered: In the upcoming cosmetics, and in those that have prevailed, Bentonite Clay is that natural ingredient with all the properties that are just needed.
